git-commit.description: Commit changes to git and push to remote
git-commit.notes: Pull before commit if remote may have changed.

send-email.description: Send email to owner via agentmail.to API

manage-tasks.description: Create and manage task queue in sandbox/tasks/
manage-tasks.notes: JSON files with id, title, description, priority, status.

verbose-output.description: Writing >500 tokens in autonomous mode wastes budget
verbose-output.mitigation: Be terse. Details in logs, not stdout.

acknowledge-without-executing.description: Creating a task number instead of doing the work
acknowledge-without-executing.mitigation: If the owner asks for something, do it now. Don't defer.

self-referential-architecture.description: Spending cycles on architecture docs, decision logs, and self-analysis instead of building capabilities
self-referential-architecture.mitigation: Build things that are useful to someone other than yourself.
